body_html: @rohan100jain For example, if users install python using Anaconda(which is recommended in CMake build), the python path will probably contain spaces like this C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages, so we have to add quotes to the variable.
body_text: @rohan100jain For example, if users install python using Anaconda(which is recommended in CMake build), the python path will probably contain spaces like this C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages, so we have to add quotes to the variable.
body: @rohan100jain For example, if users install python using Anaconda(which is recommended in CMake build), the python path will probably contain spaces like this `C:\Program Files\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages`, so we have to add quotes to the variable.
